sentences.sContent: the theories that underpin his teaching method
sentences.sCn: 支持他的教学方法的理论

sentences.sContent: America’s wealth is underpinned by a global system which exploits the world’s poor.
sentences.sCn: 美国的财富是靠一个剥削全世界穷人的全球体系来支撑的。

synos.tran: 巩固；支持；从下面支撑；加强…的基础

remMethod.val: under(在…下) + pin(钉住) → 在下面钉住 → 加固…的基础， 巩固

trans.tranCn: 巩固；支持；从下面支撑；加强…的基础
trans.tranOther: to give strength or support to something and to help it succeed
